categorygroup.name: WebConsole
categorygroup.comment: Service Level Availability by Functional Group

category.label: Overall Service Availability
category.comment: This category reflects availability of all services currently being monitored by OpenNMS.

category.label: Network Interfaces
category.comment: This category reflects the ability to 'ping' managed devices and SNMP agents. 'Ping', using the ICMP protocol, tests a devices network connectivity/availability.
